programme.title: How Did They Fix That? S2
programme.desc: Mike Davidson goes to the biggest automated package sorting facility in the world - UPS Worldport in Louisville, Kentucky. Two million packages go through here every day, and it's up to the hardhat heroes behind the scenes to make it all happen.

programme.title: How Did They Fix That? S2
programme.desc: In Philadelphia, Mike Davidson is on streets, in tunnels, on tracks and in trolley restoration garages - working shoulder-to-shoulder with the team that keeps one of America's largest and oldest mass transit systems running smoothly and on time.

programme.title: Air Warriors S7
programme.desc: They’re the toughest battles for pilots: Dogfights. In this kind of gritty air-to-air combat, a split-second decision determines life or death. Get the inside story on dogfighting from some of the military’s foremost fighter pilots.

programme.title: Air Warriors S7
programme.desc: They’re on the front lines of America’s toughest missions: state-of-the-art helicopters. Air Warriors: Top Choppers takes viewers behind the scenes and on-board aircraft that dominate today’s battlefields.

programme.title: Air Warriors S7
programme.desc: When ground troops are in trouble, they call for one thing: Close Air Support. Their guardian angels the A-10 THUNDERBOLT, the F-16 VIPER, the B-52 STRATOFORTRESS, the AC-130 and the HARRIER JUMP JET.

programme.title: Air Warriors S7
programme.desc: Get up close and personal with America’s first strike fighter – the legendary F-18 Hornet and Super Hornet. We fly along in these legendary strike fighters that take out everything from bunkers to bad guys.

programme.title: Air Warriors S10
programme.desc: See how the British bomber Lancaster flew out of the factory and into action, leading devastating attacks on Germany.

programme.title: Air Warriors S10
programme.desc: Discover how and why the fighter-bomber Panavia Tornado has been so useful in so many roles for so many years.

programme.title: How Did They Fix That? S2

programme.title: Loch Lomond: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: It is spring, and migrating ospreys return to the park. Pregnant red deer come down from the mountain tops to the lowlands to calve. On a mountainside, two big cocks fight for the right to mate in a spectacle called a lek.

programme.title: Loch Lomond: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: It is now June, and the park is bathed in 17 hours of daylight. With the warm temperatures come rich pickings, but for the newborn the summer months are crucial as they learn to fight, find food and avoid predators.

programme.title: Loch Lomond: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Autumn is when stags compete to breed, osprey chicks begin a 3000-mile migration to West Africa, salmon return to the rivers where they were born and adders give birth to live young.

programme.title: Oceans Africa
programme.desc: Often referred to as the dinosaur fish, the coelacanth occupies a unique place in the fossil record, and when it was rediscovered almost a century ago it shook the scientific community. We follow its journey to the present day, accompanying WildOceans' scientists on an expedition to uncover more of their secrets and behaviours.

programme.title: Oceans Africa
programme.desc: In A 'Tale Of Two Sharks' we take a look at the incredible array of sharks found off the South African coast, focusing on the endangered Scalloped Hammerhead and the iconic Great White.

programme.title: Alaska: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: The end of winter heralds one of the world's greatest feeding frenzies as large ocean predators target the millions of fish who have found refuge in the Gulf of Alaska.

programme.title: Alaska: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: With the arrival of spring, days grow longer and temperatures rise. However, spring in Alaska is short. Animals have just two months to find food and start a family, while avoiding predators.

programme.title: Alaska: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Summer has arrived in Alaska.This sets the scene for one of the world's greatest migrations of the Alaskan salmon run.

programme.title: Alaska: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Humpback whales return to Alaska's rich feeding grounds and salmon return to spawn in the rivers. The returning salmon however have to negotiate a path past hungry brown bears.

It’s going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before it’s too late.

Noddy uses all his skills of thinking, looking, listening and asking questions to find the home for the little duck. Things aren't helped by the little duck constantly rushing back to the Dinolab! What is going on? Clever Noddy realises that the little duck is the missing duckling from the new family of ducks at the Calm Farm and soon reunites her with her Mummy and sister. programme.desc: Ted and PC Selby are building a zipwire to run from Greendale Crag all the way down into the valley. The kids are on a hike, led by Lauren which is due to culminate at the zipwire – the only trouble is, it's not built yet! Pat and Jess have to race against time to deliver the huge steel cable to the top of the crag before the kids get there. All's going well until Pat hits bumpy ground and the cable rolls out of the back of the jeep and back down the hill! It takes the combined efforts of Pat, Ben, the SDS helicopter and some nifty map reading to rewind the uncoiled and hopelessly tangled cable and get it back up to Greendale Crag. Pat makes it just in time and the zipwire is a roaring success – even Pat and Jess have a go on it. Mission accomplished!

programme.desc: This week's challengers tackle a complicated build; crafting a working oven from all natural materials, like sand, wood and water.

programme.title: Mountain Men (S12)

programme.title: The Secret Of Skinwalker Ranch (S4)
programme.desc: As a new year of investigations begin on Skinwalker Ranch, members of the team confront a secret that Dr. Travis Taylor has had to keep from them for the past two years.

programme.title: Swamp People (S14)
programme.desc: It is an all-out Gator War as hunters battle head-to-head in a competition to win 350 new alligator tags at the end of the season. Troy aims to get an early lead.

programme.title: How Disney Built America

programme.title: NHK WORLD TV Special program
programme.desc: A selection of acclaimed programs from NHK's domestic channels dubbed into English.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: J-MELO
programme.desc: Japan's exciting music scene! Pop, rock, traditional and more! Live performances, artist interviews, plus all the latest news.

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 1-15.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini
programme.desc: Male cosmetics and hair removal treatments are increasingly popular in Japan. Historically, Japanese men have used makeup for over a thousand years. We look at the evolution of male aesthetics.

programme.title: A Cat's-Eye View of Japan
programme.desc: A cat patrols Ogaki Castle and has a special place where he cools off on hot days. In Magome-juku, a 400-year-old post town, two cats live at a souvenir store. We capture an unexpected interaction!

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.desc: Lori and Brandon get in a fight over a bin and make a wager to see who can do better. Lori eyes a bin with a tanning bed, while a bin with fake walls intrigues Brandon. Meanwhile, Papa Bear and Jesse vie for a bin full of antique furniture.

programme.title: Smallville S1 4
programme.desc: Clark reels from his first flashes of X-ray vision. His shock is compounded when he witnesses a bank robbery, apparently by his friend, Lex.

programme.desc: Earl, a man in his 80s, is broke, alone, and facing foreclosure of his business when he is offered a job that simply requires him to drive. Easy enough, but, unbeknownst to Earl, he's just signed on as a drug courier for a Mexican cartel...

programme.title: Wrath Of The Titans

programme.title: The West Wing S1 8
programme.desc: The President embarrasses Hoynes during a cabinet meeting.

programme.title: Friends S6 19
programme.desc: Ross worries when his student/girlfriend goes on vacation with her wild friends. Rachel needs a date for a ball. Joey's refrigerator breaks down.

programme.title: Friends S6 20
programme.desc: In this episode primarily composed of clips from earlier shows, Joey auditions for a major television role. But Chandler almost ruins everything by forgetting a telephone message.

programme.title: Friends S6 21
programme.desc: Ross fails to impress his girlfriend's father. Joey jeopardizes his acting role by insulting a robot. Phoebe writes a book about Monica and Chandler.

programme.title: Run All Night
programme.desc: Lately, it seems Jimmy's only solace can be found at the bottom of a whiskey glass. But when Jimmy's estranged son, Mike (The Killing's Joel Kinnaman), becomes a target, Jimmy must make a choice between the crime family he chose and the real family he abandoned long ago. With Mike on the run, Jimmy's only penance for his past mistakes may be to keep his son from the same fate Jimmy is certain he'll face himself...at the wrong end of a gun. Now, with nowhere safe to turn, Jimmy just has one night to figure out exactly where his loyalties lie and to see if he can finally make things right.

programme.title: Blood Diamond
programme.desc: Academy Award nominees Leonardo DiCaprio and Djimon Hounsou join Academy Award winner Jennifer Connelly in this action drama from Ed Zwick, the filmmaker behind The Last Samurai. DiCaprio stars as Danny Archer, a mercenary smuggler searching for a priceless diamond amid the chaos of Sierra Leone's civil war; Hounsou (Gladiator), as a desperate father searching for his lost son; and Connelly (A Beautiful Mind), as a reporter searching for the truth behind the trade in 'conflict diamonds.' Forced to confront the brutal human cost of the diamond trade, Archer changes his search for financial reward to a quest for redemption.

programme.desc: While Oliver tends to the Canary's wounds, he tries to get her to talk. But when they're both attacked by the League of Assassins, she confesses that she's connected.

programme.desc: It is all about the sambal. Kevin treks through the lush Perak rainforests to hunt for the next unique sambal, before taking a trip to Isan to learn more about its 3 main flavour components.

programme.title: On The Red Dot
programme.desc: On The Red Dot offers weekly in-depth analysis and discussion on key issues and events that matter to Singaporeans.

programme.title: Asia Tonight
programme.desc: CNA correspondents bring you the top stories of the day with 'live' reports and interviews to keep you up-to-date on the day’s events.

programme.title: The New Locals
programme.desc: In the 1960s, many South Koreans moved to countries like Malaysia to escape economic hardship. Today, they still see Malaysia as a potential home but for its calmer pace of life.

programme.title: The Nuclear Option
programme.desc: The Nuclear Option explores new technologies in place, trade-offs to be considered, and attitudes to be addressed, in the global quest to harness nuclear power.

programme.title: Singapore Tonight
programme.desc: From business to politics, health to technology, the latest news from Singapore and analysis of the impact.

programme.title: Money Mind
programme.desc: Money Mind is all about how to save, how to invest, and how to better spend your money. The show brings you weekly personal finance tips to help you make all the right money moves in Asia. Because, personal finance matters.

programme.title: Asia First
programme.desc: (Live) Top stories, business news and market updates from across the region as Asia gears up for the day ahead.

programme.title: Isolation
programme.desc: The story is inspired by a true event. Creighton whisks his wife away for a vacation on a remote island in the Bahamas to save their marriage, but finds themselves hunted down by modern day pirates instead. With no one to trust but each other, the couple is forced to work together and fight for their lives.

programme.title: Encroach
programme.desc: University freshman Zhen Xin finds her classmates, except You Mei, very unfriendly to her, and the two quickly became good friends. Zhen Xin lives in the dormitory and constantly hears strange noises. When she was attacked by a man in black, You Mei saved her and the latter’s identity is also revealed.

programme.title: Dorome Boys version
programme.desc: Drama clubs from an all-boys and all-girls high school hold a joint training camp. A series of horrific and ususual events soon take place at the camp and the students learn that an old mountain legend creature, Dorome, is responsible.

programme.title: Lost Memories
programme.desc: As a young mother grapples with her daughter's mysterious disappearance, a series of eerie events unfold. These events could be linked to the vengeful ghosts of a tragic accident that happened 20 years ago...

programme.title: Chop Chop
programme.desc: A young couple's tranquility is shattered by a psychotic serial killer one quiet evening. Their battle for survival reveals hidden truths, entangling them unwittingly with the criminal underworld.

programme.title: Isolation
programme.desc: The story is inspired by a true event. Creighton whisks his wife away for a vacation on a remote island in the Bahamas to save their marriage, but finds themselves hunted down by modern day pirates instead. With no one to trust but each other, the couple is forced to work together and fight for their lives.

programme.title: Encroach
programme.desc: University freshman Zhen Xin finds her classmates, except You Mei, very unfriendly to her, and the two quickly became good friends. Zhen Xin lives in the dormitory and constantly hears strange noises. When she was attacked by a man in black, You Mei saved her and the latter’s identity is also revealed.

programme.title: Bahay Na Pula
programme.desc: Jane and her husband Marco go to the ancestral house that Jane inherited from her grandmother. As they move into the house, Jane starts to experience horrifying events and her belly mysteriously grows bigger every day, as if she has gotten pregnant all of a sudden…

programme.title: Room For Rent
programme.desc: Lonely widow Joyce rents out a room in her house and becomes dangerously obsessed with a younger guest. Desperate for love, she is willing to eliminate anyone hindering her pursuit of happiness, and a chilling tale of obsession unfolds.

programme.title: Never Leave
programme.desc: Strange incidents keep happening in Lin Yue's house after a car accident: her sister cannot see the images of her family members in the mirror; her father is peeping at night; and there is the sound of marbles from the attic every day at dawn. Following the sound to the attic, Lin Yue finds her own death portrait as she opens the door...

programme.title: Evie
programme.desc: When young Evie discovers a cursed necklace washed up on the beach, she is unaware of the malevolent force tied to it. As the necklace's dark power begins to grip her, she inadvertently awakens a deadly water demon intent on claiming her and everyone she holds dear.

programme.title: Mid-night Two
programme.desc: Yi Cheng and his friends venture into a haunted mountain that hides an ancient corpse and an eternal ghostly flame. No one who enters the mountain ever returns and at 2:30 AM, Yi Cheng’s friends vanish one by one. While searching for them in the eerie forest, Yi Cheng enters a realm of infinite reincarnation, facing a series of terrifying events…

programme.title: Comme Des Tetes Pas De Poule
programme.desc: Sigis discovers a graffiti tag at school and decides to reply, but finds himself face-to-face with the tagger. Felix is stressed-out because he has to kiss an actress in one scene.

programme.title: Ernest Et Celestine, La Collection
programme.desc: Ernest, a grumpy bear with a generous heart, offers a home to Celestine, a mischievous little orphan mouse, in his tumbledown house. Two friends with characters as different as their size; but that doesn't stop them enjoying endless adventures filled with fun and fantasy.

programme.title: Opj
programme.desc: Jackson and Kelly think they're carrying out a routine vehicle check, until they open the car boot and the two police officers discover a body. The driver is in shock as he recognises his wife's lover.

programme.title: Opj
programme.desc: Jackson and Kelly are finding their investigation far from simple. The case is riddled with false pretences and sorting truth from lies and deceit requires enormous perspicacity.

programme.title: Incognito
programme.desc: Nicolas Lacroix, also known as Nico En Vrai, comedian and actor, talks about his one-man show ''Trop Gentil''. Mickey Boccar and Florian Jubin, who form the offbeat duo Furious Monique, present their theatrical and musical show, Voie Lactique.

programme.title: Kavalkades
programme.desc: In the Isere, Mathilde Labat meets Julien, a western riding enthusiast. Then to the Drome where emilie, physiotherapist, puts her patients on horseback. Finally, in the Puy-de-Dome, Laurent and Romane have set themselves a crazy challenge, to relaunch a breed on the verge of extinction, the Auvergne horse.

programme.title: Stoemp, Peket... Et Des Rawettes
programme.desc: A veritable celebration of Belgium's regions, along with the locals who live there, their regional languages... and their humour!

programme.title: a Bon Entendeur
programme.desc: 'aBE'' examines a wide range of topics affecting everyday life in everyday homes: it tests products, compares prices, highlights fraudulent practices, raises consumer awareness and questions manufacturers. The programme addresses economic, social, environmental and health issues and talks about leisure activities, technology...

programme.title: Les Belges Du Bout Du Monde
programme.desc: Adrien Joveneau meets Mathieu Soyeur from Hainhault, founder of a kitesurfing school in one of the best locations in the world for a sport that has the wind very much in its sails: Tarifa in Spain. It's continental Europe's most southerly spot, just opposite the African coast.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: La Carte Aux Tresors
programme.desc: Heading for Hyeres in the Var department. The game stretches from the foothills of the Maures massif to the island of Porquerolles via the medieval town and the Giens peninsula. Contestants: elodie and Frederic.

programme.title: Echappees Belles
programme.desc: The Seychelles, a name synonym with sun, fine sandy beaches, paradise on Earth. But this archipelago made up of 115 islands has other treasures: mangrove swamps, waterfalls, surprising hikes and endemic species that are unique in the world. Several of its nature reserves are classified and scrutinised across the world.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Les Chefs !
programme.desc: Second challenge: the twelve contestants have just 90 minutes to cook, working in pairs, a vegetable flan and a gastronomic partridge or pheasant main course.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Fort Boyard Et Les Cellules Interdites
programme.desc: The Petit Coeur de Beurre association works to improve the quality of life of patients born with congenital heart disease from ante-natal to adulthood. With Natasha St-Pier, eve Gilles, Sören Prevost, Paloma, Lolita Banana, Joseph Kamel.

programme.title: La Course En Tete
programme.desc: Belgian racing cyclist Eddy Merckx won everything between 1966 and 1976. A total of six hundred and twenty-five victories. In 1974, Joel Santoni made a film about the professional and private life of this great champion, nicknamed ''the Cannibal''.

programme.title: Dans Le Noir
programme.desc: After surviving the journey across the Mediterranean, a young Guinean migrant finds refuge in Paris with a Senegalese dandy who makes a living by renting out his ID documents.

programme.title: Planete Rap
programme.desc: Ably-hosted by Fred Musa on Skyrock, ''Planete Rap'' sets the standard when it comes to rap programmes in France. Thanks to an innovative, fully-optimised system, discover the television adaptation of the radio format that regularly attracts hundreds of thousands of listeners!

programme.title: Fort Boyard 2024, Toujours Plus Fort !
programme.desc: With Natasha St-Pier, eve Gilles, Sören Prevost, Paloma, Lolita Banana, Joseph Kamel, for the Petit Coeur de Beurre association.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Saint-George, Le Mozart Noir
programme.desc: Also known as the ''Black Mozart'', the Chevalier de Saint-George was one of the most brilliant figures of 18th century Europe. An extraordinary violinist, adored orchestral conductor, he composed several operas and a number of lyrical works before sinking back into oblivion. A look back at his career.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Inde Du Sud, Le Charme Tamoul
programme.desc: South India, long-coveted for its geographical location, still retains the marks of its colonial past. Today Hindu religious fervour is expressed by the spectacular festivities that continue to attract travellers to the region. With its excesses and wealth, South India remains one of Asia's gems.

programme.title: Via Idra, Entre Terre Et Ciel
programme.desc: We leave the Cristallina mountain hut en-route for that of Garzonera. On the programme: Alpine stars and carnivorous plants. From Garzonera, the route takes us to Campo Tencia and an opportunity to discover the pine trees and ibex of the Via Idra.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Merci Professeur !
programme.desc: A short review of the French language, its quirks, accents and news.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Abers Road
programme.desc: From Trinite-sur-Mer in Carnac with a detour to Plouharnel, Gaetan Roussel discovers the musical universe of Charles Souchon, alias 'Ours'. Second son of the famous French singer Alain Souchon, like other singers (Arthur H and -M-) he has chosen to make a career for himself without emphasising his surname.

programme.title: Ma Petite Escapade
programme.desc: Marc spends all his free time working as a volunteer with Les Petits Freres des Pauvres. Clemence Castel takes him to explore the hidden secrets of Mont Saint Michel and also invites him to achieve one of his dreams: a parachute jump.

programme.title: The Rain in España ep 9
programme.desc: The Rain in España follows the story of Kalix, a student hailing from a family of doctors who decided to tread a different path and take up Legal Management at Ateneo de Manila University. During his stay there, he crosses paths with Luna, an Architecture student from the University of Santo Tomas

programme.title: Destiny Guard ep 3
programme.desc: Angels of destiny work as security guards, matching people with their soul mates and making sure they end up together. But what if a female guard falls in love with a man under her watch?

programme.title: Da Pers Family ep 8
programme.desc: A story of a couple who preserves the family bakery business legacy from closure. Now the couple’s children, volunteers to step in and help the business. Are the parents willing to accept change and innovations of the new generation?

programme.title: Mga Kwentong Epik: Bernardo Carpio ep 6
programme.desc: Live action series of original Epik superheroes and comic book characters.

programme.title: Sing Galing Season 3 Ep 27 (Semifinals)
programme.desc: Sing Galing is a Philippine videoke singing reality game show. The contestants must know the right lyrics to any randomly chosen song, be it Filipino or foreign, without going out of tune. If the contestant fails to sing the right lyrics and in tune, an animated genie would pop up on the screen and strike an animated gong to signal the end of the unfortunate aspirant's chance at instant wealth and glory.

programme.title: Masked Singer S3 ep 8 Part 2
programme.desc: New Season, new masked singers, exciting twists and triple the fun on the third season of Masked Singer Pilipinas

programme.title: Mga Kwentong Epik: Maria Makiling ep 1

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 3
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.

programme.title: Bella Bandida ep 5
programme.desc: Loosely based on Francisco V. Coching's comic book of the same name, the story follows Bella, a medical doctor in her late 20's whose mission on life is to give back to her hometown, Santiago. Bella is in a relationship with Brick, the town councilor, and the nephew of the town mayor, Tigro.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S2 ep 1
programme.desc: Since the end of Season 1, Par Jack (Benjie Paras) has made his ghost whispering ability a full-time business and is now a popular Ghost Whisperer in the country. Still with the help of his sidekicks, Nik and Bur, they now conduct business at their new facility, Day Scare Center.

programme.title: The Mysterious Case of Ana Madrigal ep 1
programme.desc: Christine, an up and coming investigative journalist (Maui Taylor) is hot on the trail of a cold case for her new television show. This cold case is close to her heart because the victim happens to be her estranged half sister, Ana Madrigal. Together with her TV crew, Christine attempts to uncover the truth behind what really happened on the night of her sister's death - even if it kills her.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 3
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S2 ep 1
programme.desc: Since the end of Season 1, Par Jack (Benjie Paras) has made his ghost whispering ability a full-time business and is now a popular Ghost Whisperer in the country. Still with the help of his sidekicks, Nik and Bur, they now conduct business at their new facility, Day Scare Center.

programme.title: Bella Bandida ep 5
programme.desc: Loosely based on Francisco V. Coching's comic book of the same name, the story follows Bella, a medical doctor in her late 20's whose mission on life is to give back to her hometown, Santiago. Bella is in a relationship with Brick, the town councilor, and the nephew of the town mayor, Tigro.

programme.title: The Rain in España ep 9
programme.desc: The Rain in España follows the story of Kalix, a student hailing from a family of doctors who decided to tread a different path and take up Legal Management at Ateneo de Manila University. During his stay there, he crosses paths with Luna, an Architecture student from the University of Santo Tomas
